a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTCholeraWCRBSVaccine3DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC-rBS vaccine 3 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a cholera vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Whole cell-recombinant B subunit (WC-rBS) vaccine, 3-dose schedule for clients aged 2–5 years * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTCholeraWCRBSVaccine3DosesLogic

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as client\'s age is less than 2 years. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first cholera dose.'
"Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

def.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for cholera vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no cholera doses have been administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 5"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than approximately 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 5

then.value: Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than approximately 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as client\'s age is less than 2 years. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first cholera dose.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no cholera doses have been administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than {Member States defined lower limit} days ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

'Should vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than approximately 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 5"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than approximately 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
